com.vmware.vapi.protocol.server.rpc.http

Interface SslEndpoint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Endpoint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpsEndpoint

    public interface SslEndpoint
extends Endpoint
    An SSL endpoint.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.vapi.protocol.server.rpc.http.Endpoint

        The keystore password;

      • getKeyAlias

        String getKeyAlias()
        Returns the alias of the key/cert pair to use for this endpoint. This value may not be configurable for some implementations. For example, the Jetty SSL connectors will always look for a key/cert pairs whose alias is "jetty".
        Returns:
        The alias of the key/cert pair to use for this endpoint.

      • getKeyPassword

        String getKeyPassword()
        Returns the key password.
        Returns:
        The key password;

      • getTrustStorePath

        String getTrustStorePath()
        Returns the path to the trust store.
        Returns:
        The path to the trust store. May be null if no trust store is configured.

      • getTrustStorePassword

        String getTrustStorePassword()
        Returns the trust store password.
        Returns:
        The trust store password. May be null if no trust store is configured.

      • setNeedClientAuth

        void setNeedClientAuth(boolean needed)
        Sets whether the server will require the client to authenticate with certificate.
        Parameters:
        needed - true if authentication is needed

      • setWantClientAuth

        void setWantClientAuth(boolean wanted)
        Sets whether the server will desire the client to authenticate with certificate.
        Parameters:
        wanted - true if authentication is desired

      • getNeedClientAuth

        boolean getNeedClientAuth()
        Gets whether server requires the client to authenticate with certificate.
        Returns:
        true if client must provide certificate

      • getWantClientAuth

        boolean getWantClientAuth()
        Gets whether server desires the client to authenticate with certificate.
        Returns:
        true if client may provide certificate

      • getEnabledProtocols

        String getEnabledProtocols()
        Gets the list of protocols that are enabled for use by SSL connections.
        Returns:
        list of protocols enabled to use by SSL connections.
